author: timbeiko
content: Is there a bit more specific of an agenda for tomorrow's call? Has anyone stepped up to lead the discussion on 2935? Are there specific things about the txn envelope we want to figure out on the call?

content: About 2935, I checked with <@259648573401071617> and he mentioned that he isn’t championing the proposal but has some alternative approach and will be joining the call tomorrow to discuss.

author: poojaranjan
content: About transaction envelope, I think there was some open questions from the last meeting that people couldn’t discuss in absence of <@301186049323958275> to include it in the yolo v2 and it was moved to the next meeting. Hopefully, it can be discussed further to be included in v2.
